# xshield_template (Data Source)

Template DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "xshield_template" "my_template" {
}
```

- `access_policy_template` (Boolean)
- `colortokens_managed` (Boolean)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
